channel.title: Is it possible to get a haircut?
channel.description: i dont like the hair my guy has, and theres no hairdresser, can i still change my hair somehow?? :confused: thx..

item.title: Is it possible to get a haircut?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

For a second, I thought he meant in real life :S

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to get a haircut?

item.title: Is it possible to get a haircut?
item.dc:creator: @the_S0RR0W the S0RR0W
item.description:
@the_S0RR0W wrote:

yes, use the ::char command and it will dispaly the edit character screen displayed at the start of runescape,

Thanks

S0RR0W

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to get a haircut?

item.title: Is it possible to get a haircut?
item.dc:creator: @Zodeon Zodeon
item.description:
@Zodeon wrote:

Aryan isnt a Server it is a bot, there are many different sources that you can use for your server. I reckon your probably using TestScape because thats the one most people use. There loads of Tuts for the ::char command, Use the Search function on this site.

Read full topic
